combinedline: What are you doing here?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Repairs. I thought you could help me out.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: What have you done to my ship?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Your ship? Hey, remember, you

speaker: HAN
combinedline: lost her to me fair and square.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: How you doing, Chewbacca?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Still hanging around this loser?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Hello. What have we here? Welcome. I'm Lando Calrissian. I'm the administrator of this facility. And who might you be?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Leia.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Welcome, Leia.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: All right, all right, you old smoothie.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Hello, sir. I am See-Threepio, human-cyborg relations. My facilities are at your...

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Well, really!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: What's wrong with the Falcon?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hyperdrive.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I'll get my people to work on it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Good.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: You know, that ship saved my life quite a few times. She's the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: How's the gas mine? Is it paying off for you?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Oh, not as well as I'd like. We're a small outpost and not very self-sufficient. And I've had supply problems of every kind. I've had labor difficulties... What's so funny?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You. Listen to you - you sound like a businessman, a responsible leader. Who'd have thought that, huh?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: You know, seeing you sure brings back a few things.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Yeah. I'm responsible these days. It's the price you pay for being successful.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Nice to see a familiar face.

speaker: PROTOCOL DROID
combinedline: E chu ta!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: How rude!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: That sounds like an R2 unit in there. I wonder if... Hello? How interesting. my.

speaker: MAN'S VOICE
combinedline: Who are you?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I'm terribly sorry. I... I didn't mean to intrude. No, no, please don't get up. No!

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Luke! You must complete the training.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I can't keep the vision out of my head. They're my friends. I've got to help them.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: You must not go!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: But Han and Leia will die if I don't.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: You don't know that. Even Yoda cannot see their fate.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: But I can help them! I feel the Force!

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: But you cannot control it. This is a dangerous time for you, when you will be tempted by the dark side of the Force.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Yes, yes. To Obi-Wan you listen. The cave. Remember your failure at the cave!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: But I've learned so much since then. Master Yoda, I promise to return and finish what I've begun. You have my word.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: It is you and your abilities the Emperor wants. that is why your friends are made to suffer.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: And that is why I have to go.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Luke, I don't want to lose you to the Emperor the way I lost Vader.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You won't.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Stopped they must be. On this all depends. Only a fully trained Jedi Knight with the Force as his ally will conquer Vader and his Emperor. If you end your training now, if you choose the quick and easy path, as Vader did, you will become an agent of evil.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Patience.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: And sacrifice Han and Leia?

speaker: YODA
combinedline: If you honor what they fight for, yes!

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: If you choose to face Vader, you will do it alone. I cannot interfere.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I understand.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Artoo, fire up the converters.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Luke, don't give in to hate - that leads to the dark side.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Strong is Vader. Mind what you have learned. Save you it can.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I will. And I'll return. I promise.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: Told you, I did. Reckless is he. Now matters are worse.

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: That boy is our last hope.

speaker: YODA
combinedline: No. There is another.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: The ship is almost finished. Two or Three more things and we're in great shape.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: The sooner the better. Something's wrong here. No one has seen or knows anything about Threepio. He's been gone too long to have gotten lost.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Relax. I'll talk to Lando and see what I can find out.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I don't trust Lando.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Well, I don't trust him, either. But he is my friend. Besides, we'll soon be gone.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: And then you're as good as gone, aren't you?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What happened?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Where?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Found him in a junk pile?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Oh, what a mess. Chewie, you

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: think you can repair him?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Lando's got people that can fix him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: No, thanks.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I'm sorry. Am I interrupting anything?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Not really.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: You look absolutely beautiful. You truly belong here with us among the clouds.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Thank you.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Would you join me for a little refreshment?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Everyone's invited, of course.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Having trouble with your droid?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: No. No problem. Why?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: So you see, since we're a small

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: operation, we don't fall into the...jurisdiction of the Empire.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: So you're part of the mining guild then?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: No, not actually. Our operation is small enough not to be noticed... which is advantageous for everybody since our customers are anxious to avoid attracting attention to themselves.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Aren't you afraid the Empire's going to find out about this little operation and shut you down?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: That's always been a danger that looms like a shadow over everything we've built here. But things have developed that will ensure security.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I've just made a deal that will keep the Empire out of here forever.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: We would be honored if you would join us.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I had no choice. They arrived right before you did. I'm sorry.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I'm sorry, too.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No, Threepio's with them.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Just hang on. We're almost there.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, oh my. I. I'm terribly sorry- Take this off! I, don't mean to intrude here. I, don't, no, no, no... Please don't get up. No!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: NO! Secret. Stormtroopers? Here? We're in

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: danger. I must tell the others. Oh no! I've been shot!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Lord Vader.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You may take Captain Solo to Jabba the Hut after I have Skywalker.

speaker: BOBA FETT
combinedline: He's no good to me dead.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: He will not be permanently damaged.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Lord Vader, what about Leia and the Wookiee?

speaker: VADER
combinedline: They must never again leave this city.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: That was never a condition of our agreement, nor was giving Han to this bounty hunter!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Perhaps you think you're being treated unfairly.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: No.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Good. It would be unfortunate if I had to leave a garrison here.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: This deal is getting worse all the time.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, yes, that's very good. I like that. Oh! Something's not right

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: because now I can't see.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh. Much better. Wait.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Wait! Oh. my! what have you done? I'm backwards, you stupid furball.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Only an overgrown mophead like you would be stupid enough...

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I feel terrible.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Why are they doing this?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: They never even asked me any questions.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Lando.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Get out of here, Lando!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Shut up and listen! Vader has agreed to turn Leia and Chewie over to me.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Over to you?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: They'll have to stay here, but at least they'll be safe.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What about Han?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Vader's given him to the bounty hunter.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Vader wants us all dead.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: He doesn't want you at all. He's after somebody called Skywalker.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Luke.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Lord Vader's set a trap for him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: And we're the bait.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Well, he's on his way.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Perfect. You fixed us all pretty good, didn't you? My friend!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Stop!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I've done all I can. I'm sorry I couldn't do better, but I have my own problems.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah, you're a real hero.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: You certainly have a way with people.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: This facility is crude, but it should be adequate to freeze Skywalker for his journey to the emperor.

speaker: IMPERIAL SOLDIER
combinedline: Lord Vader, ship approaching. X-wing class.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Good. Monitor Skywalker and allow him to land.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Lord Vader, we only use this facility for carbon freezing. If you put him in there, it might kill him.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: I do not want the Emperor's prize damaged. We will test it... on Captain Solo.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: If only you had attached my legs, I wouldn't be in this ridiculous position. Now, remember, Chewbacca, you have a responsibility for me, so don't do anything foolish.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What's going on... buddy?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: You're being put into carbon freeze.

speaker: BOBA FETT
combinedline: What if he doesn't survive? He's worth a lot to me.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: The Empire will compensate you if he dies.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Put him in!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: No! No, no, no! Stop,

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Chewbacca, stop...!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Stop, Chewie, stop! Do you hear me? Stop!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Yes, stop, please! I'm not ready to die.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey! Hey! Listen to me. Chewie! Chewie, this won't help me. Hey!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Save your strength. There'll be another time. The princess - you have to take care of her. Do You hear me, huh?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I love you!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I know.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: What... what's going on? Turn around, Chewbacca, I can't see.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh, they've encased him in carbonite. He should be quite well-protected - if he survives the freezing process, that is.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Well, Calrissian, did he survive?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Yes, he's alive. And in perfect hibernation.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: He's all yours bounty hunter.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Reset the chamber for Skywalker.

speaker: IMPERIAL OFFICER
combinedline: Skywalker has just landed, my lord.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Good. See to it that he finds his way here.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Calrissian, take the princess and the Wookiee to my ship.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: You said they'd be left in the city under my supervision.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: I am altering the deal. Pray I don't alter it any further.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke! Luke, don't - it's a trap! It's a trap!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: The Force is with you, young Skywalker. But you are not a Jedi yet.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Well done. Hold them in the security tower - and keep it quiet. Move.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What do you think you're doing?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: We're getting out of here.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I knew all along it had to be a mistake.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Do you think that after what you did to Han we're going to trust you?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I had no choice...

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: What are you doing? Trust him, trust him!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Oh, we understand, don't we, Chewie? He had no choice.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: I'm just trying to help...

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: We don't need any of your help.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Han...

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: It sounds like Han.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: There's still a chance to save

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Han...

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: at the East... Platform...

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Chewie.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I'm terribly sorry about all this. After all, he's only a Wookiee.

speaker: BOBA FETT
combinedline: Put Captain Solo in the cargo hold.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo! Artoo! Where have you been?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Turn around, you wooly...!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Hurry, hurry! We're trying to save Han from the bounty hunter!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Well, at least you're still in one piece! Look what happened to me!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh no! Chewie, they're behind you!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You have learned much, young one.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: You'll find I'm full of surprises.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Your destiny lies with me, Skywalker. Obi-Wan knew this to be true.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: All too easy. Perhaps you are not as strong as the emperor thought. Impressive. Most impressive. Obi-Wan has taught you well. You have controlled your fear. Now ... release your anger. Only your hatred can destroy me.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: The security codes has been changed!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo, you can tell the computer to override the security system.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo, hurry!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Attention! This is Lando Calrissian. Attention. The Empire has taken control of the city. I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: This way.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Don't blame me. I'm an interpreter. I'm not supposed to know a power socket from a computer terminal.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Ah! We're not interested in the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon. It's fixed! Just open the door, you stupid lump.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I never doubted you for a second. Wonderful!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: That hurt. Bend down, you thoughtless...!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Leia! Go!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I thought that hairy beast would be the end of me. Of course, I've

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: looked better.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: You are beaten. It is useless to resist. Don't let yourself be destroyed as Obi-Wan did. There is no escape. Don't make me destroy you. Luke, you do not yet realize your importance. You have only begun to discover your power. Join me and I will complete your training. With our combined strength, we can end this destructive conflict and bring order to the galaxy.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I'll never join you!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: If you only knew the power of the dark side. Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: He told me enough! He told me you killed him.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: No. I am your father.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No. No. That's not true! That's impossible!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Search your feelings. You know it to be true.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No! No!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Luke. You can destroy the Emperor. He has foreseen this. It is your destiny. Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy as father and son. Come with me. It is the only way.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Ben. Ben, please. Ben.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Leia! Hear me! Leia!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke...

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: We've got to go back.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: What?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I know where Luke is.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: But what about those fighters?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Chewie, just do it.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: But what about Vader?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All right, all right, all right.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Alert my Stardestroyer to prepare for my arrival.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Look, someone's up there.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: It's Luke.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Chewie, slow down. Slow down and we'll get under him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Lando, open the top hatch.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Okay. Easy, Chewie.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Lando?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Okay, let's go.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Leia.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All right, Chewie. Let's go.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I'll be back.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Star Destroyer.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: All right, Chewie. Ready for

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: light speed.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: If your people fixed the hyperdrive.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: All the coordinates are set. It's now or never.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Punch it!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: They told me they fixed it. I trusted them to fix it. It's not my fault!

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: They'll be in range of our tractor beam in moments, my lord.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Did your men deactivate the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon?

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Yes, my lord.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Good. Prepare the boarding party and set your weapons for stun.

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Yes, my lord.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Noisy brute. Why don't we just go into light speed?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: We can't? How would you know the hyperdrive is deactivated?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: The city's central computer told you? Artoo-Detoo, you know better than to trust a strange computer.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Ouch! Pay attention to what you're doing!

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Luke.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Father.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Son, come with me.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Chewie!

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: It's Vader.

speaker: VADER
combinedline: Luke... it is your destiny.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Ben. Why didn't you tell me?

speaker: PIETT
combinedline: Alert all commands. Ready for the tractor beam.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Artoo, come back at once! You haven't finished with me yet! You don't know how to fix the hyperdrive. Chewbacca can do it. I'm standing here in pieces, and you're having delusions of grandeur!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: You did it!

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Luke, we're ready for takeoff.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Good luck, Lando

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: When we find Jabba the Hut and that bounty hunter, we'll contact you.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I'll meet you at the rendezvous point on Tatooine.

speaker: LANDO
combinedline: Princess, we'll find Han. I promise.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Chewie, I'll be waiting for your signal.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Take care, you two. May the Force be with you.
